projects.name: Arweave

projects.summary: Arweave storage is now natively available on Avalanche. Users can now pay for permanent storage using Avalanche wallets and AVAX tokens. This opens a new design space for building truly decentralized applications on Avalanche, where everything from the UI to the smart contracts to the database is decentralized. Happy building!

projects.name: Ascenders
projects.highlight: Ascenders is the first Triple A open world Action RPG with a fully decentralized, player driven economy deployed on Avalanche.
projects.summary: Ascenders is an original multiplayer open-world Action RPG that brings forward influences from Zelda: Breath of the Wild and Eve Online, forging them into a fresh and stunning immersive experience and catapults them into the dynamic crypto gaming scene. The result is a new multi-platform science-fantasy world filled with danger, adventure, and exotic horizons - all to be explored and mastered. Ascenders will feature a revolutionary game economy that reimagines what a multiplayer RPG would look like if fully decentralized, and built entirely around DeFi concepts. Players would be able to trade resources in a global marketplace, creating a user-driven, self-sustaining economy.

projects.name: Atlas DEX
projects.highlight: Atlas DEX provides a seamless trading experience for anyone looking to make native cross-chain swaps across leading blockchains.
projects.summary: Atlas DEX is a cross-chain liquidity aggregator. Users can seamlessly swap over 1,500 native tokens to and from Avalanche, Solana, Ethereum, BNB Chain, Polygon and Fantom. The platform splits trades across different liquidity pools to access the best price and minimize slippage. The platform will further integrate leading blockchains and develop new products. Atlas DEX is building to improve cross-chain interoperability, making it a go-to platform for DeFi users.

projects.name: Avado

projects.name: Avalanche Bridge
projects.highlight: The Avalanche Bridge, providing a fast, low cost, and secure means to move assets between chains.
projects.summary: The Avalanche Bridge (AB) is a low cost, low latency, and secure way to transfer assets from one blockchain to another. Leveraging Intel SGX and built on the back of Avalanche’s low energy and high TPS consensus algorithm, the AB provides users a smooth, quick, and inexpensive experience. Currently supporting the movement of ERC20’s from Ethereum onto the Avalanche C-Chain and back, Ava Labs has plans to advance the bridge further and increase the number of connected chains. Ava Labs designed the Avalanche Bridge on the principles that transactions across the bridge will be secure and finality will be swift. This makes Avalanche’s official bridge one of the best options to move assets onto the Avalanche C-Chain. Good Bridging.

projects.name: Bitgo
projects.highlight: Enables our clients to navigate the complex landscape of digital assets with a connected, compliant, and secure suite of solutions.
projects.summary: BitGo is the leader in digital asset financial services, providing institutional investors with liquidity, custody, and security solutions with over $64B in assets under custody. Founded in 2013, BitGo pioneered the multi-signature wallet and is the first digital asset company to focus exclusively on serving institutional clients. Active in both centralized and decentralized finance, BitGo offers market leading trading, lending, and borrowing services through its prime brokerage services and acts as the custodian for WBTC, with more than $19 billion in custody and circulation. In 2020, BitGo launched BitGo Portfolio and Tax, providing clients with a full-stack solution for digital assets. In 2018, it launched BitGo Trust Company, the first qualified custodian purpose-built for storing digital assets. BitGo processes approximately 20% of all global Bitcoin transactions, and supports over 400 coins and tokens. BitGo provides the security and operational backbone for more than 700 institutional clients in 50 countries, including many regulated entities and the world’s top cryptocurrency exchanges and platforms. BitGo is backed by Goldman Sachs, Craft Ventures, Digital Currency Group, DRW, Redpoint Ventures, and Valor Equity Partners.

Copper's key features enable price discovery, permissionless participation, fair distribution, capital efficiency, while also preventing sniper bots or whales from dominating an LBP. No gas wars, no whitelists, no allocation games.

projects.name: Deloitte
projects.highlight: The Close As You Go™ (CAYG) platform helps state and local government officials simplify and streamline disaster reimbursement applications to the FEMA
projects.summary: Deloitte’s Close as You Go (CAYG) is a secure, cloud-based software platform built to help state and local government agencies manage recovery documentation to demonstrate eligibility for FEMA Public Assistance expenditures. CAYG helps reduce the likelihood of submitting ineligible expenses, referencing outdated contracts, or following improper procurement practices that cause federal clawbacks down the line. CAYG helps you navigate the process so you can focus on recovery.

projects.name: Imperium Empires
projects.highlight: AAA-quality MMORTS space metaverse on Avalanche, built by accomplished game devs with 10+ yrs experience. It revolutionizes blockchain games through high quality graphics and gameplay, well-thought-out tokenomics, team-to-earn guild mechanics and deep DeFi integration.
projects.summary: Imperium Empires is the first AAA-quality MMORTS space metaverse on Avalanche, built by accomplished game devs with 10+ yrs experience. Funded by top-tier VCs such as GBV Capital and Three Arrows Capital, Imperium Empires is set to revolutionize blockchain gaming through its AAA-quality graphics and gameplay, well-thought-out tokenomics design, guild mechanics and deep DeFi integration. Imperium Empires solves 4 major problems commonly seen in other blockchain games: (i) low-quality graphics and limited gameplay - simply put, no fun for play-to-earn; (ii) hyperinflationary and unsustainable tokenomics - with no NFT burn mechanisms, NFT supply inflates exponentially through breeding, so play-to-earn rewards drain fast and collapse as the number of players grows; (iii) lack of guild-based gameplay that bonds guild members together and retain players in the long term; and (iv) lack of deep DeFi integration except for liquidity-mining-styled single sided staking.

projects.summary: inSure DeFi is a Decentralized Insurance Ecosystem, trusted by thousands of community members to protect their crypto portfolios from scams, exchange closures, and drastic devaluations.  inSure DeFi Ecosystem is DAO-based and community-governed, ensuring all matters are voted on by community members. Generous staking rewards for contributors help incentivize the Liquidity Pool depth - boosting the stability of SURE tokens. The community funds are continuously distributed, meaning, capital is reinvested and ecosystem stability is ensured. inSure DeFi underwrites Centralized Exchange asset risks as well as NFT, DeFi, and Metaverse ecosystem risks over multiple blockchains.

projects.name: Liminal
projects.highlight: At Liminal our mission is to simplify self custody. We make it extremely easy and secure for individuals and businesses to manage their digital assets without giving up control and ownership.
projects.summary: Liminal is an enterprise-grade platform that offers a robust infrastructure for managing digital assets. Liminal enables crypto-native companies to securely scale their digital asset operations through hardware devices backed, plug and play wallet architecture. Liminal's security-first approach, allows projects to define customized policies and assign roles to users based on their responsibilities. Their zero key leakage tolerance approach helps companies in eliminating the risks associated with digital asset transfers, such as cyber-attacks, internal collusion, and human error. Their unified interface ensures the same wallet management experience for multiple blockchains. Their proprietary regulatory readiness program, which includes AML checks, travel rules, and CCSS-compliant platforms, helps projects fast-track their compliance journey.

Lootex provides a fraud-free, cross-blockchain ecosystem that allows for transparent trading powered by smart contracts. Game developers and gamers alike can design and build their own branded stores to sell the rare items that they collect. If you are interested in GameFi, play-to-earn games, or the Metaverse, Lootex is the place to be.

projects.name: Mastercard
projects.highlight: Connect your crypto start-up to our ecosystem of banks, merchants, partners and digital players across the globe.
projects.summary:
Through Mastercard's Start Paty Crypto Program, founders of crypto, blockchain and digital assets startups come to us looking to address a host of pain points – asset tokenization, data accuracy, digital security, seamless access between the traditional and digital economy, and more. Leveraging our expertise helps their continued growth and development. 
Start Path Crypto is the first Start Path program to focus on the unique needs of crypto/blockchain companies. Rather than individual sponsors for six months, the startups will be introduced to relevant teams, customers and partners as a group over three months.
Our aim is to bring innovative companies into our network with less emphasis on commercial outcomes, with a right to invest in a future equity round.

projects.name: Nereus Finance
projects.highlight: DeFi protocol that provides lending, savings, and payment solutions
projects.summary: Nereus is a DeFi protocol that provides lending, savings, and payment solutions. Nereus supports saving, farming, and lending strategies for everyone from the crypto novice to the crypto native. Variable Rate Lending (Liquidity Markets): With Nereus liquidity markets users can participate as depositors or borrowers. Depositors provide liquidity to the market to earn a passive income, while borrowers can borrow tokens against over-collateralised positions at variable interest rates. 0% Interest Borrowing (NXUSD Borrowing): With NXUSD, the Nereus protocol native over-collateralised stablecoin, users can deposit their assets and borrow NXUSD against this collateral at 0% interest. NXUSD Payments: Through Nereus' partnership with Wirex, users can add NXUSD to their Wirex app and directly spend NXUSD using the Wirex crypto debit card.

Multi-chain and built to scale, Nested allows users to build a profile and then create, copy, manage, update, send and share financial portfolios. These financial portfolios — the 'Nested portfolios'— are represented as non-fungible tokens (NFTs), reflecting sets of tokens.

projects.name: Peachfolio
projects.highlight: Track all your DeFi tokens from the moment they launch
projects.summary: Trade safer. Trade smarter. No matter your level of experience. Get cutting-edge tracking and analytics tools that help you tradentokens with confidence, whether you’re an experienced trader or new to DeFi. The Peachfolio ecosystem is the only multi-platform smart solution that delivers portfolio data, market analytics, crypto news, and financial tools right to your fingertips. The Peachfolio app is an easy-to-use wallet tracker app optimized for your DeFi portfolio. You can keep track of all your wallets, set price alerts, and get in-depth insights for all of your tokens, even brand-new ones.
